data.title: Tribute for Michael Lynn McClure
authors: Lane Funeral Home - South Crest Chapel

data.meta_site_name: Tribute for Michael Lynn McClure | Lane Funeral Home - South Crest Chapel
data.text:
Michael Lynn McClure, 58, of Ringgold, Georgia passed away Sunday, April 14, 2024. He was born in Chattanooga, Tennessee on November 22, 1965. He spent most of his life in the North Georgia area and was a member of New Friendship Baptist Church in Chickamauga, Ga. He worked as a laborer for brick mason’s most of his life. He also worked as a delivery driver and District manager for Chattanooga Times Free Press. In 2005, he started his own business, McClure’s Brick Cleaning and worked there until one week before his passing. The main thing about Michael is he was a hard worker. Most people he worked for would hire him back if he left them. He was outgoing and couldn’t go anywhere without knowing someone. He was very dedicated to taking care of his wife and kids. Most of his life he worked seven days a week at two different jobs. Michael was known as “Hank” to his co-workers and loved his pets.

He was preceded in death by his Parents, Leroy and Peggy Sue McClure; Son, Robbie McClure.

Those left to cherish his memory are his Wife of thirty four years, Loretta “Lorrie” McClure; Children, Michael Adam McClure, Kayla McClure, Tenae North; Grandchildren, Elizabeth, Ashanti, Trent, Charles and Annsleigh; Brother, Jesse McClure; Sister, Cynthia Alexander; many cousins, Aunt, Wanda Lynn, and lots of extended family members and friends.

Condolences can be shared with the McClure family and live webcasting of the funeral at lane-southcrestchapel.com

The funeral service will he held Thursday, April 18,2024 at 1:00 PM. In the South Crest Chapel of Lane Funeral Home and Crematory.

The family will receive friends from 12:00 – 8:00 PM Wednesday and Thursday from 9:00 AM until the funeral hour of 1:00 PM.

All arrangements are by Lane Funeral Home and Crematory South Crest Chapel Rossville, Georgia.
